item.title: Operators in Dart
item.description: What are Operands & Operators in Dart? In mathematics, an operator is a mathematical symbol or function that indicates the operation to be done on a value or a set of values. This is similar to how an operator in programming works. An operator defines how the operands will be processed. Consider a simple expression val3 = val1 + val2. Here, val1 and val2 are the operands, and + is the operator.
